sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access
sys_hub_action_type_definition.sys_name: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

action.display_value: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

sys_variable_value.value:
<# .Notes Created By : Dhanya Maddukuri Contact : Dhanya Maddukuri Version : 4.0 Created Date : 09/06/2019 Modified Date : 09/12/2019 Modified Date : 10/01/2019 Modified Date : 11/23/2019 Modified Date : 12/02/2019 Modified Date : 12/10/2019 .SYNOPSIS Software Request: SR automation for GAF Share Access (Request\Revoke GAF Share Access) Gets input(for whom we need to Provide\Revoke access, and for which share) from service now catalog Provide\Revoke the access to the users for the particular requested Share by adding the ID in respective AD groups #> #param($Readacc, $Group, $RWacc, $Revokeacc) $csv1 = @() $OverallStatus = @() $csv = @() $Substring = $Group.Substring(0,$Group.Length-2) $ReadGroup = $Substring + '_R' $WriteGroup = $Substring + '_W' #$password1 = ConvertTo-SecureString "" -AsPlainText -Force #$Cred = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("wbi\sccmauto-srv", $password1) $userName = 'wbi\sccmauto-srv' $encrypted = Get-Content 'E:\Scripts\WPS\Software_Provision_Prod\pass1.txt' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString -string $encrypted $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $userName,$password if($Readacc) { $ReadIDS = $Readacc.split(",") $RIDScount = $ReadIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $RIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Add-ADGroupMember -Identity $ReadGroup -Members $ReadIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $ReadIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share. Please logoff & login to your PC changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to provide Read Access for $ReadIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($RWacc) { $RWIDS = $RWacc.split(",") $RWIDScount = $RWIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $RWIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Add-ADGroupMember -Identity $WriteGroup -Members $RWIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $RWIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share. Please logoff & login to your PC changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to provide Read\Write Access for $RWIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($Revokeacc) { $REVOKEIDS = $Revokeacc.split(",") $REIDScount = $REVOKEIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $REIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Remove-ADGroupMember -Identity $WriteGroup -Members $REVOKEIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $REVOKEIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "Your access to the share has been revoked as per the request but still you will be able to access the share for sometime until the changes applied. Please logoff & login to your PC for changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to Revoke Read\Write Access for $REVOKEIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($Revokeacc) { $REVOKEWIDS = $Revokeacc.split(",") $REWIDScount = $REVOKEWIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $REWIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Remove-ADGroupMember -Identity $ReadGroup -Members $REVOKEWIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $REVOKEWIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "Your access to the share has been revoked as per the request but still you will be able to access the share for sometime until the changes applied. Please logoff & login to your PC for changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to revoke Write Access for $REVOKEWIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($OverallStatus -contains 'failure') { $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' }) } else { $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Resolved Successfully' }) }

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.name: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

parent_action.display_value: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

action.display_value: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

sys_variable_value.value:
<# .Notes Created By : Dhanya Maddukuri Contact : Dhanya Maddukuri Version : 4.0 Created Date : 09/06/2019 Modified Date : 09/12/2019 Modified Date : 10/01/2019 Modified Date : 11/23/2019 Modified Date : 12/02/2019 Modified Date : 12/10/2019 .SYNOPSIS Software Request: SR automation for GAF Share Access (Request\Revoke GAF Share Access) Gets input(for whom we need to Provide\Revoke access, and for which share) from service now catalog Provide\Revoke the access to the users for the particular requested Share by adding the ID in respective AD groups #> #param($Readacc, $Group, $RWacc, $Revokeacc) $csv1 = @() $OverallStatus = @() $csv = @() $Substring = $Group.Substring(0,$Group.Length-2) $ReadGroup = $Substring + '_R' $WriteGroup = $Substring + '_W' #$password1 = ConvertTo-SecureString "" -AsPlainText -Force #$Cred = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("wbi\sccmauto-srv", $password1) $userName = 'wbi\sccmauto-srv' $encrypted = Get-Content 'E:\Scripts\WPS\Software_Provision_Prod\pass1.txt' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString -string $encrypted $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $userName,$password if($Readacc) { $ReadIDS = $Readacc.split(",") $RIDScount = $ReadIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $RIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Add-ADGroupMember -Identity $ReadGroup -Members $ReadIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $ReadIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share. Please logoff & login to your PC changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to provide Read Access for $ReadIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($RWacc) { $RWIDS = $RWacc.split(",") $RWIDScount = $RWIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $RWIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Add-ADGroupMember -Identity $WriteGroup -Members $RWIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $RWIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share. Please logoff & login to your PC changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to provide Read\Write Access for $RWIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($Revokeacc) { $REVOKEIDS = $Revokeacc.split(",") $REIDScount = $REVOKEIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $REIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Remove-ADGroupMember -Identity $WriteGroup -Members $REVOKEIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $REVOKEIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "Your access to the share has been revoked as per the request but still you will be able to access the share for sometime until the changes applied. Please logoff & login to your PC for changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to Revoke Read\Write Access for $REVOKEIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($Revokeacc) { $REVOKEWIDS = $Revokeacc.split(",") $REWIDScount = $REVOKEWIDS.Count for($i = 0;$i -lt $REWIDScount;$i++) { Write-Host "Request" Remove-ADGroupMember -Identity $ReadGroup -Members $REVOKEWIDS[$i] -Credential $Cred -Confirm:$false if($?) { $OverallStatus += 'Success' Write-Host "Requested access has been provided successfully" $user = Get-ADUser -Identity $REVOKEWIDS[$i] -Server 'WBI.NXP.COM' -Credential $Cred -Properties * $name = $user.GivenName $email = $user.EmailAddress $smtp = "smtp.eu-rdc02.nxp.com" $to = $email #$CC = 'dhanya.maddukuri@nxp.com' $from = 'nxp-itwps.communication@nxp.com' $subject = "$request" $body = "Hi " + $name + "

" $body += "We would like to inform you that your request for Shared Folder access has been processed

" $body += "Your access to the share has been revoked as per the request but still you will be able to access the share for sometime until the changes applied. Please logoff & login to your PC for changes to take effect.

" $body += "If you have any issues or for further clarifications contact: HCL_Desktop_Engineering@nxp.com

" $body += "Thanks,
" $body += "HCL Workplace Services" send-MailMessage -SmtpServer $smtp -To $to -From $from -Subject $subject -Body $body -BodyAsHtml } else { $OverallStatus += 'failure' Write-Host "Unable to provide\revoke access to the user. Assigning to team" $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv1 += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' 'Remarks' = "Unable to revoke Write Access for $REVOKEWIDS[$i]" }) } } } if($OverallStatus -contains 'failure') { $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Assigning to Support team' }) } else { $date = (Get-Date).tostring('yyyy-MM-dd') $time = (get-date).tostring('hh:mm:ss tt') $csv += New-object psobject -property ([ordered] @{ 'RITM' = $request 'Date' = $date 'Time' = $time 'Status' = 'Resolved Successfully' }) }
